name: Deep space fractaling
description:
Deep in the far reaches of space, where the fabric of the universe twists in on itself, there are profits to be made.

The Fractal, Yggdrasil, or The Fray is a great tear in the fabric of the universe where the known laws of physics and reality begin to break down, and rare elements that cannot naturally occur materialise.

The deeper you go, the rarer the yield, the greater the profits. 

But take care. 

Much like the crushing depths of the ocean, the depths of the Fractal is harsh and frighteningly alluring.

Do you have what it takes to be a fractal miner? 

-------------

CONTROLS

WASD - Move

Space - Shoot

P - Pause

CREDITS
